trends: There has been one other sighting in Nelson
There were no other sightings in Nelson on or around June 30th 2005
divs: Sighting Detailswe had just gone for dinner and we were heading back to my uncles house. we had stopped at a traffic light and i looked up to see if i could see the stars, and i saw the outline of a large triangle and looked closer and could see little lights on each of its corners and a large one in the middle. At first i thought it was an airplane but it wasn't moving and none of its lights were blinking. i watched it for a little while and it started moving a little and then it took off in an incredible speed i knew it wasn't an airplane then because no airplane could go from floating in the air like that to that kindof speed. when it took off it made a little streak of light behing it. i started freaking out and saying i just saw a ufo.
Summary: lights on each corner and one big one in the center
